class.name: SQLiteQuery
class.description: A class that represents a compiled SQLite query, allowing you to execute the query with optional arguments and retrieve results.

method.name: batch_execute
method.description: Executes the query for each row in the given array of rows. Returns an array of results, one for each row executed.

method.name: execute
method.description: Executes the query with the given arguments. Returns the result of the query as a Variant.

method.name: get_columns
method.description: Returns an array containing the names of the columns in the result set.

method.name: get_last_error_message
method.description: Returns the last error message generated by the SQLite query.
